item.title: hugo 配置文件
item.description: hugo conf文件的简单配置 baseURL = "https://gejigejiemmm.github.io/" title = "gejigejiemmm" theme = "hugo-notepadium" copyright = "©2020 gejigejiemmm." languageCode = "zh-cn" hasCJKLanguage = true enableRobotsTXT = true # Enable Disqus #disqusShortname = "XXX" # Google Analytics #googleAnalytics = "UA-123-45" [markup.highlight] codeFences = true noClasses = false [markup.goldmark.renderer] unsafe = true # enable raw
